title: You thought i was gone [rant thread]
body:
You thought i was gone with my net rants,BUT HERE WE GO AGAIN,perfect internet,perfect connection but i failed to connect to the server and get remaked because the thing did not want to load,are there any logs or something i can give you?

EDIT : tried second game immediatly after,not a single issue,this seriously can't be my fault again

EDIT2 : stuff happens,i lost a bit of lp,but if i can i would just like to receive an explanation as to why this happened

replies.body:
So you're probably right about your internet being in perfect condition, that I'm not debating at all. The thing most people miss is that even with a perfectly stable internet speed with the best network settings, once your connection leaves your home network it's up to your ISP to send that connection to our servers in the best way. Sometimes that signal can be bounced around the United States before it even hits our server, which could cause some disconnects. 

I know you mentioned just wanting some kind of explanation, but let's go ahead and test something out. Check out this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with the network logs from a game that disconnected you. Grab a quick screenshot, post it here, and we can see what your connection looks like after it leaves your network.

Oh man this is such a drag,caught red handed,this is the first log [that works] for 23.7.2017 ,but my client didnt actually show this,it just stayed at green 47 [+1 -1 xd]

http://i.imgur.com/eMRYaen.png

Also the quality of this picture is really somethin else,but you pretty much understand whats happening

EDIT : i think this is like the 3rd time i made myself look stupid over this issue and now while attempting to post a gif im doing the same http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8eRuW3Mg56Q/Uj9nsaZY_SI/AAAAAAAAAQo/eApSgdZ4svg/s1600/87.jpg

Oh no worries buddy, the internet can be a fickle mistress sometimes xD!

After looking over those logs, it definitely looks like packet loss was the culprit. We might be able to help smooth things out by double checking your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but more often than not it happens from some kind of ISP issue. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well and they might be able to give a little more context.

Nah man i think there is no need,this is not a recuring issue at all it just happens,i just thought this time was different because i didnt notice any changes in my ping [even tho they did exist],once again a poro saves the day [goes on a search for more naruto memes]
